The circus is coming to town. Please consider this before taking your family to the circus:
Training methods are often abusive, cruel and stressful. Circus trainers use whips, tight collars, electric prods, bullhooks, and other tools to break animals? spirits and teach submission. In fact, The ASPCA, the Fund for Animals and the Animal Welfare Institute brought a lawsuit against Ringling Bros. under the Endangered Species Act for its mistreatment of elephants. Earlier this year, the U.S. Court of Appeals rejected Ringling's arguments that the case should be thrown out, and the case will go forward in federal district court in Washington, D.C.
